results.title: Jim Henson's the storyteller. vol. 2
results.creator_credit: Duncan Kenworthy, Jim Henson Productions, TVS Films, Jon Amiel, Paul Weiland and Jim Henson
results.brief_description: Three folktales narrated by John Hurt featuring live action and characters created by Jim Henson. 1. “The luck child” A Russian story of a seventh son and the power of prophecies. 2. “The three ravens” A German tale of enchantment by a wicked witch turning children into ravens and the spell broken by the king’s daughter being able to keep silent. 3. “Heartless giant” A German tale of a giant with no heart terrorising a country and the king’s son who befriends him and searches for his heart.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Duncan Kenworthy, Jim Henson Productions, TVS Films, Jon Amiel, Paul Weiland and Jim Henson

results.title: Jim Henson's the storyteller. Vol. 1
results.creator_credit: Jim Henson Productions, TVS Films, Mark Shivas, Duncan Kenworthy, Steve Barron and Charles Sturridge
results.brief_description: Three folktales narrated by John Hurt featuring live action and characters created by Jim Henson. 1. “Hans my hedgehog” A German story about a cursed half-boy, half-hedgehog who can only be freed by loyal love. 2. “A Story Short” A Celtic tale of a storyteller who, if he fails to tell his king a story nightly for a year, will be thrown into a pot of boiling oil. 3. “Fearnot” A German story of a boy who does not know what fear is and attempts to find out.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jim Henson Productions, TVS Films, Mark Shivas, Duncan Kenworthy, Steve Barron and Charles Sturridge

results.title: Jim Gamble puppet classics
results.creator_credit: Jonathan Bogner, David Touster and Bogner Entertainment
results.brief_description: Jim Gamble has been making puppets for many years, including a period making puppets for Disneyland. In this series of delightful puppet plays he brings some of the most well-known children’s stories to life.

results.title: Jilted
results.creator_credit: Mermaid Beach Productions, Bill Bennett and Jenny Day
results.brief_description: Set around a tropical island resort where Al works trying to escape his past, and where Harriet is running from a failed marriage. Both hurt in the past, they become involved - until disturbed by the arrival of another woman. Cast includes Richard Moir, Jennifer Cluff, Steve Jacobs, Tina Bursill and Helen Mutkins.

results.title: Jhaoo Chowdhari: a Tongawallah from Delhi
results.creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions and Yavar Abbas
results.brief_description: Faces of India series. Shows intimate details of family life of a Delhi tradesman and of the district around his home. We see his wives and daughters occupied in housework and in caring for the all important horses, which pull the tonga which is Jhaoo’s livelihood. Also shows sacred shrines never before filmed. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: JFK: Director's cut; Beyond JFK: the question of the conspiracy (S) (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: A. Kitman Ho, Ixtlan Corporation and Oliver Stone
results.brief_description: Starring Kevin Costner, Joe Pesci, Tommy Lee Jones and Gary Oldman, JFK also features an extensive gallery of appearances by acclaimed actors including Ed Asner, Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon and Donald Sutherland. This release has an additional 17 minutes of footage, providing more excitement, intrigue and insight into Jim Garrison’s turbulent investigation of President John F. Kennedy’s assassination. “Beyond JFK: the question of conspiracy” is a ninety minute documentary re-examining the issues raised by the film and features interviews with persons involved in the Garrison investigation plus astonishing eyewitness accounts. Includes Jim Garrison’s last recorded interview prior to his death.

results.brief_description: Starring Kevin Costner, Joe Pesci, Tommy Lee Jones, and Gary Oldman, JFK also features an extensive gallery of appearances by acclaimed actors including Ed Asner, Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon and Donald Sutherland. This exclusive release has an exta 17 minutes of new footage added, providing more excitement, intrigue and insight into Jim Garrison’s turbulent investigation of President John F. Kennedy’s assassination. Also included on this tape is “Beyond JFK: The question of the conspiracy” a ninety-minute documentary that re-examines the issues raised by the film, featuring interviews with the people who were involved in the Garrison investigation plus astonishing eyewitness accounts. Includes Jim Garrison’s last recorded interview before he died.

results.title: Jezebel
results.creator_credit: Henry Blanke, Warner Bros Pictures and William Wyler
results.brief_description: On the eve of the Civil War, Julie Marston, a wilful southern belle, does everything in her spiteful power to goad her fiance into a jealous rage. When he is stricken by the plague, she reforms and tries to atone her wicked and sinful ways. Starring Henry Fonda and Bette Davis in her second Best Actress Academy Award performance. Based on the play by Owen Davis Sr.

results.title: Jewels of the Kimberley
results.creator_credit: Mitch Matthews, Rio and Rhonda Mabey
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Jack Absalom’s outback Australia series”.
The original jewels in the Kimberley in Australia’s far north west were the hardy pioneer cattlemen and women who crossed the Continent with their herds to establish themselves as Kings in Grass Castles. They were followed by gold prospectors and farmers who opened up the mighty Ord River Irrigation Scheme. The newest jewels are diamonds. They were discovered by the new prospectors who are now reaping rich rewards for the millions of dollars they spent prospecting for their jewels. Rated: G
